#summary Setting up the DMO/DMW generator run configurations.

Now that you have the dark-matter-examples project available in Eclipse, you're going to need to create a couple of run configurations to access the Dark Matter Object (DMO) generator and the Dark Matter Wrapper (DMW) generator. 

 # Select the run configuration menu and hit Run Configurations... <br> <br> <img height="200" src="http://dark-matter-data.org/images/runConfigs1.png"/>
 # Double click Java Application to create a new run configuration <br> <br> <img height="400" src="http://dark-matter-data.org/images/runConfigs2.png"/> <br> 
 # Name the configuration DMO Generator. Set Main class: dmo and then hit Search... <br> <br> <img height="440" src="http://dark-matter-data.org/images/runConfigs3.png"/>
 # Select DmoGeneratorMain and hit OK <br> <br> <img height="440" src="http://dark-matter-data.org/images/runConfigs4.png"/>
